name: Ruthless Power Boat - 3D Shooting & Racing Game
name_original: Ruthless Power Boat - 3D Shooting & Racing Game
description:
Ruthless Power Boat - , race your hydro powerboat, loaded with best arms & ammunition in the ultimate water racing combat game. Be the top reckless rider in ruthless water racing world, race shoot crush and sink every boat that come in your way.
you’ll have a chance to test your skills in naval battle combat boat. If you love riding racing shooting and sailing on sea in speedboat, then you’re in for a real treat! This free battleship game is been designed for boys, girls and adults.

In the hot world of water racing, things go fast. Impose your style by customizing and upgrading your powerboat and weapons to be the hottest navy driver on land!

Race around exotic locations, feel the real racing thrill and become the best pilot on the waves!

Beware though, your chase for fame power money and fortune might take an unexpected turn.

Features:
> Simple Game play with Easy and Smooth Controls.
> Pick Booster Powers ups like Coin 2X Booster and Magnet Booster Power while driving.
> Vibrant Sound effects for Crashed, Strikes, Hits, kills and Whacks etc
Pure Entertainment Simulation
> Sail and destroy through water canals across Desert, Snow , Highway, offroad, Jungle, City, Hills, Mountains, Rocks, Ice Road
> Powerboats Loaded with firearms from Piston, Minigun, Riffle,Submachine gun, light machine guns,Browning Automatic Rifle, heavy machine gun, Laser Shooter, Flame Thrower, Missile Launcher.
> Increasing difficulty as you reach higher level, the chase becomes more tough and racers become more fast strong and armoured
> Lots Of opponent rival traffic to blowoff starting from Ski boat, Surf superboat , missileboat, Patrolboat, steam gunboat, Armoured battlecruiser, TroopShip, Battleship ......
> 3d Person Camera view featured for fastest and dangerous auto race combat drive
> Neat and realistic high defination 3d graphics built for the speed, focus on the chase with the intense clarity of the display.

If you’re tired of driving a regular car, bike, bus or monster truck and looking for some real fun superboat riding you’ll definitely enjoy Gun boat Havoc - Navy Shooter. Your goal will be to escape the deadly waters and pilot your speedboat in endless shooter speedrace. But nothing comes easy - training and a lot of driving and shooting practice with your turbo charged vessel will be required in order to be the champion. As one of the best, free, and professionally designed 3d games of it's kind, it is full of addictive turbo charged watercrafts that you will be racing and shooting.

Speed is something you’ll need, along with an eagle eye and super shooter skills to have the slightest chance in mastering this free 3D driving and shooting simulator. It might seem easy to ride a yacht at first but once you push the lever of your nitro powered engines to full ahead - taming a monster truck will look like a walk in the park. This free 3D sim will provide you with plenty of challenge and even more fun. Your kids and your whole family will love it! But remember - none of these fireboats is a toy to ride. When you drive a car or a bike simulator you can always stop to take a breath.
